Class DisplayCounters

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      jam.DisplayCounters
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.util.Observer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public final class DisplayCounters
extends javax.swing.JDialog
implements java.util.Observer

Displays buffer countesr of sort threads. Gives the number of buffers and events received and sorted.

Version:
05 newest done 9-98
Author:
Ken Swartz
See Also:
Serialized Form
